Text.Page:
We've done all we can, but the prisoners held on the third level of the Citadel of Torment can't be saved.

All we can do for them is send in someone to put them out of their misery before they transform any further.

I need you to kill the {@LinkCreature:33#16#anguished} and {@LinkCreature:33#18#decaying minions}, and {@LinkCreature:33#66#rotting prisoners} and {@LinkCreature:33#68#slaves}.

I wouldn't ask if it didn't need to be done. Tell Iorine when you've finished.
Thank you. I know that wasn't easy.
This isn't your normal mission, but someone must bring the prisoners mercy.
